shows.title: Tigress
shows.desc: High energy rock with driving guitars and huge choruses, anyone? Tigress are burning bright. They’ve shared a stage with Green Day, they’ve played Download, Kerrang! loves them. Signed to megacool label LAB records, where their stablemates include Marsicans and Stereo Honey, their output gets huge airplay and their live shows are unmissable. Come and hear them roar.
